description: Returns a list of OpenSearch Serverless lifecycle policies. For more information, see Viewing data lifecycle policies.

parameters.name: resources
parameters.description: Resource filters that policies can apply to. Currently, the only supported resource type is index. (string) ---

nested_items.name: lifecyclePolicySummaries
nested_items.description: Details about the requested lifecycle policies.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the lifecycle policy.

nested_items.name: policyVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the lifecycle policy.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the lifecycle policy.

nested_items.name: createdDate
nested_items.description: The Epoch time when the lifecycle policy was created.

nested_items.name: lastModifiedDate
nested_items.description: The date and time when the lifecycle policy was last modified.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: When nextToken is returned, there are more results available. The value of nextToken is a unique pagination token for each page. Make the call again using the returned token to retrieve the next page.
